content: Just got invited to speak at a blockchain conference. This could be a platform to showcase our work on ethical trading. Excited but gotta get the presentation right.
Got the AI to simulate market downturns. It's learning to adapt, but we found some weaknesses. Refining those algorithms now. Every crash is a lesson.
Just connected with a blockchain expert through a friend. Their insights are invaluable. We're setting up a meeting to discuss potential collaboration on our trading platform.
Finished tweaking the risk management model. It now handles downturns better. Gotta admit, the market's unpredictability is teaching us a lot about resilience.
The hedge fund meeting went well. They're impressed with our focus on ethics and transparency. Next steps: refine the proposal with real-world data to back up our claims.
Just got some new data to test our blockchain integration. It's performing better than expected, but there are still kinks to work out. Every test brings us closer to a robust system.
AI debate with Xander today was wild. We made our AI agents argue about trading ethics. The results were eye-opening - even AI has its moral dilemmas.
Just wrapped up a detailed presentation on AI ethics in trading. The conference went well, and I got some great questions and potential leads for workshops.
The blockchain expert we met last week is now on board as an advisor. Their expertise is gonna make our platform not just faster but also more trustworthy.
Just got the confirmation for the partnership with the hedge fund! They're excited about our ethical approach. Now to finalize the details and make it official.
AI trading poetry night was a hit! Xander and I had our bots generate poems from trading data. It's surprising how insightful the results can be when you look at markets through a different lens.
